definition: to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch

sentences.english: The use of fishing nets with mesh smaller than the specified minimum size is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用小於最小網目尺寸的網具進行捕撈。

sentences.english: Green crab catches without your work course of study commonly but breed latent capacity artificially very big.
sentences.chinese: 青蟹一般無大作業捕撈，但人工養殖潛力很大。

sentences.english: It is banned to sell illegally fished fishing gains in the prohibited fishing areas or within the prohibited fishing periods.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: There are no catch limits, you can catch any species - any size.
sentences.chinese: 你可以捕撈任何種類的魚，不論大小。

sentences.english: Tavira used to be a place devoted to the tuna fishing.
sentences.chinese: 塔維拉曾經就是以金槍魚捕撈業而繁盛一時的地區。

sentences.english: Owing/Due to over-fishing, the number of fishes has obviously shrunk.
sentences.chinese: 由於過渡捕撈，魚的數量明顯下降。

sentences.english: The Norwegian mackerel quota will soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 挪威鯖魚的捕撈配額快用完了。

sentences.english: Warmer oceans and over-fishing are affecting sea life.
sentences.chinese: 海洋水溫的提高以及過度捕撈嚴重影響着海洋生物。

sentences.english: Experts estimate that one out of every five fish sold was caught illegally.
sentences.chinese: 據專家估計，售賣的魚中有五分之一源於非法捕撈。

sentences.english: Yet the government still allows the animal to be fished in its waters.
sentences.chinese: 然而，當地政府仍然允許在其海域捕撈這種鯊魚。

sentences.english: Overfishing can also upset the delicate ecological balance coral reefs depend on to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 捕撈過度同樣會打破珊瑚礁賴以生存的生態平衡。

sentences.english: When a storm struck, the Russians would stop fishing, because it was too dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 當風暴來襲時，俄羅斯人將停止捕撈，因爲太危險了。

sentences.english: The sale of catch illegally harvested in the restricted fishing areas and during closed seasons is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 在禁漁區或者禁漁期內禁止銷售非法捕撈的漁獲物。

sentences.english: The state shall encourage and support the development of offshore and deep sea fisheries and make rational arrangement of fishing capacity for inland and inshore fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 合理安排內水和近海捕撈力量。

sentences.english: Fishermen will be allowed to catch grouper using vertical lines, which are dropped overboard.
sentences.chinese: 漁民只能用拋在水面的圍網釣法來捕撈鮎科魚類。

sentences.english: The optimum fishing effort of fixed net is 12912 nets.
sentences.chinese: 定置網的最適捕撈力量估算爲12912張。

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
